column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////A star is deducted because a server led the couple before us to their table
column2: then left us waiting for a good 15 to 20 minutes.  I inquired with the greeter about our table.  A small table magically became available instantaneously.  It seemed to me that the vacant table had been available
column3: yet the servers were too busy to let the greeter know
column4: so we waited longer at the front unnecessarily.
